page.title: 07Religions
page.content:
{THE UNITED FREE CHURCH
The United Free Church is about 120 years old.The Minister is Dr. Spiers. Services_Communion is held twice a year in May and October,and there are special services for Harvest Thanks Giving and Christmas.
{THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND { The church was built in 1821.The church does not have its own minister because it is a part of a shared parish based on Langholm but the minister that visits us is called Mrs Maclean.The organ in the church was built by Dr Lang a local doctor.There is a communion twice a year in May and October.They have an active Sunday school.There have been 8 ministers since the church was built.
